info.task: navigate forwards to a button inside a banner landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards to a button inside a banner landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeBannerAndHideTopLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the banner landmark, and hides the first link inside the landmark region

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Skip To Content' button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Skip To Content' button.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
